content:
NetworkAvailableEventHandler Delegate

In this Article

Represents the method that will handle the My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged or My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged event.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Advanced)]
public delegate void NetworkAvailableEventHandler(object sender, NetworkAvailableEventArgs e);

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Delegate
  • NetworkAvailableEventHandler

Remarks

In Visual Basic, you do not need to work with this delegate explicitly. For more information, see the Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged event or the Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged event.
